info.name: black swordsman
info.description: a tumblr theme for sword art online fans, includes a background picture (kirito and asuna on the volume one cover of progressive) and some cool tweaks to your dashboard n__n examples: full style | dash | logo | sidebar
info.additionalInfo: i didn't make anything! i just sort of threw some styles together into one dash theme. i used this render from mass-destruction as the background pic. credit for the super cute sidebar and the logo goes to hearttfilia. based on the greyscale theme by akimocha. i think that about covers it! my tumblr is here: http://boredartonline.tumblr.com/ (^з^)-☆
